description.para: If the global parameter yes, this boolean parameter controls whether a share will hand out persistent file handles.

Note that like durable handles, persistent handles will currently only be handed out, if additionally no, no, and no, i.e. if the share is configured for SMB only access, not supporting interoperability features with local UNIX processes or NFS operations.
This parameter has been added with Samba version 4.4.
Warning: This parameter is considered experimental in Samba 4.4.
